title: Data corrupted yet again, what now?
body:
Yesterday i made a post about suspecting that maybe Pulsefire Ezreal was damaged due to it causing a first-time scenario for me, corrupting my installation data and crashing my league. thank got my team dodged that game.

Well, i am sad to say i was wrong about the Pulsefire ezreal assumption because this time i had something else equipped and it STILL happened. again. a second time, just now as i write this post.

The patch keeps having the same corrupt datas which at literally gamestart, right after the champ select when the launcher loads the innate game, Things crash, bugsplat report Comes up and league asks me to forcibly reinstall everything because some data is damaged.

WHAT IS GOING ON!!!! Why is the patch so incoherently broken that it even keeps resetting itself?

replies.body: Sorry to hear this is still happening.  :(  There are a few factors that could continue to do this, like your hard drive might be damaged or some setting is blocking installation from happening properly.  At this point, grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to get some logs and attach it to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can look into this with you to pinpoint what the deal is.  See you there!

thank you for the answer, i will proceed to ticket the support team with all the Logs to hopefully determine what is happening.
It has not happened a 3rd time YET as of the moment of this writing, but if it happened twice it is bound to repeat again, is my worry.
Anyway, i am grateful for the quick and precise answer.
